plugin-data.name: API
plugin-data.description:
Interface to interact with Bludit using HTTP protocol.
Read more about this plugin on API Introduction.

this-is-the-maximum-of-pages-to-return-w: This is the maximum of pages to return when you call to /api/pages
this-token-is-for-read-only-and-is-regen: This token is for read only and is regenerated every time you install the plugin
